name: Tom Ford Lost Cherry
description: Lost Cherry opens with a burst of ripe cherry and sweet liqueur, wrapped in the warmth of bitter almond.

name: Tom Ford Vanilla Sex
description: Tom Ford Vanilla Sex is a deeply sensual and intimate interpretation of vanilla—far from being sugary or juvenile.

name: Black Orchid
description: Black Orchid, a rare bloom born of the quest for the perfect flower. This luxe gift set features 50mL eau de parfum bottle and 10mL travel spray.

name: Noir Extreme Parfum
description: Noir Extreme Parfum breathes a heightened concentration of spicy cardamom, spiked with the warmth of shimoga ginger and the rich sensuality of tonka bean and guaiacwood.
